title: TB Article
text:
This article delves into the determinants of active tuberculosis epidemics in Eastern African countries, providing insights into health data, trends, and key takeaways.

Objective: To analyze regional TB trends and suggest actionable insights.
Status: Published

title: Learning Tech Insights
text:
1 Learning Tech Insights
This project involves compiling and sharing insights into modern technology trends, designed for those looking to deepen their understanding of emerging technologies.

Objective: To make complex tech concepts accessible and engaging for learners.
Format: Articles, tutorials, and case studies covering key tech topics.

Explore Tech Insights

title: SIR-Cholera Model in Nairobi
text:
This project explores a Susceptible-Infected-Recovered (SIR) model to study cholera transmission dynamics in Nairobi. The model provides insights into the spread and potential control measures for cholera outbreaks.

Objective: To model cholera transmission and assess the impact of public health interventions.
Approach: Used epidemiological modeling techniques and analyzed key parameters in the SIR framework.



Read the Full Report.

title: Martin Nyamu Wanjiru - Statistician
text:
Hello! My name is Martin Nyamu Wanjiru, a statistician with over five years of experience in data analysis and research. My expertise spans various aspects of data management, clinical trials research, and statistical analysis.


With a strong background in medical statistics and hands-on experience in clinical trials research, I specialize in analyzing and managing complex datasets to provide clear, actionable insights. I am proficient in data analysis, research methodology, and statistical consulting.






Experienced in clinical trials and health-related research, focusing on evidence-based results to guide decision-making.
Skilled in data management and quality control for large-scale datasets.





Quarto: Expertise in creating dynamic documents, reports, and presentations.
LaTeX: Skilled in typesetting documents for publication, particularly in academic and professional contexts.
GitHub: Proficient in version control, collaborating on projects, and sharing research code.





R: Advanced user for statistical modeling, data wrangling, and visualization.
Python: Skilled in data analysis, machine learning, and research applications.
Excel: Proficient in advanced Excel for data manipulation and analysis.





Feel free to connect with me to learn more about my work or discuss potential collaborations! - Email: analystnyamu79@gmail.com
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Resolving ICT Issues
text:
1 Resolving ICT Issues
In this project, I analyzed and addressed common ICT problems, focusing on solutions for improved system efficiency and user experience.

Objective: To identify and resolve key ICT challenges in various contexts.
Methodology: Root cause analysis, followed by implementing technical solutions and troubleshooting strategies.
